recipes.title: Pavlova
recipes.description: Light meringue dessert topped with cream and fruit
recipes.instructions: Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gradually add sugar. Shape into nest and bake at low temperature until crisp outside and marshmallow inside. Top with whipped cream and fresh berries.
recipes.author: Modern Chef

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.description: Classic American apple pie with flaky crust
recipes.instructions: Prepare pie crust. Slice apples and toss with sugar, cinnamon, and flour. Fill crust, dot with butter, cover with top crust. Bake at 375F for 50 minutes until golden.
recipes.author: Modern Chef

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Rich, moist chocolate layer cake
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Add wet to dry, mix until smooth. Pour into prepared pans and bake at 350F for 30-35 minutes. Cool and frost with chocolate buttercream.
recipes.author: Modern Chef

recipes.title: Lemon Tart
recipes.description: Tangy lemon curd in sweet pastry shell
recipes.instructions: Prepare and blind bake tart shell. Whisk eggs, sugar, lemon juice and zest. Cook over double boiler until thickened. Pour into shell and chill until set.
recipes.author: Modern Chef

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.description: New York style creamy cheesecake
recipes.instructions: Make graham cracker crust and press into pan. Beat cream cheese until smooth, add sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Pour over crust. Bake in water bath at 325F for 1 hour. Cool slowly in oven.
recipes.author: Modern Chef

recipes.title: Suet Pudding
recipes.description: Traditional English steamed suet pudding
recipes.instructions: Mix flour with suet, add sugar and spices. Stir in milk to form soft dough. Place in greased pudding basin, cover with cloth. Steam for 3 hours. Serve with custard.
recipes.author: Eliza Acton

recipes.title: Plum Pudding
recipes.description: Rich Christmas pudding with dried fruits
recipes.instructions: Mix all dry ingredients. Add eggs and stout to bind. Pack into greased basins, cover tightly. Steam for 6 hours. Store for at least a month before serving. Re-steam to serve.
recipes.author: Eliza Acton

recipes.title: Baked Apple Pudding
recipes.description: Simple baked apple dessert
recipes.instructions: Peel and slice apples into dish. Sprinkle with sugar and spice. Make sponge batter, pour over apples. Bake at 350F for 45 minutes until golden and set.
recipes.author: Eliza Acton

recipes.title: Raisin Pudding
recipes.description: Steamed pudding studded with raisins
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and flour alternately. Fold in raisins. Pour into greased basin, steam for 2 hours. Serve with warm custard.
recipes.author: Eliza Acton

recipes.title: Bread Pudding
recipes.description: Economical pudding using stale bread
recipes.instructions: Soak bread in milk until soft. Mash and add sugar, eggs, spices, and dried fruit. Pour into greased dish. Bake at 350F for 1 hour until set and golden.
recipes.author: Eliza Acton

recipes.title: Crepes Suzette
recipes.description: Thin pancakes in orange butter sauce, flambeed
recipes.instructions: Make thin crepes. Prepare sauce with butter, sugar, orange juice and zest. Fold crepes in sauce. Add Grand Marnier and flambe at table. Serve immediately.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Peche Melba
recipes.description: Poached peaches with vanilla ice cream and raspberry sauce
recipes.instructions: Poach peach halves in vanilla syrup until tender. Place on vanilla ice cream. Top with fresh raspberry puree. Garnish with sliced almonds.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Creme Brulee
recipes.description: Rich custard with caramelized sugar top
recipes.instructions: Heat cream with vanilla. Whisk yolks and sugar. Temper eggs with hot cream. Strain into ramekins. Bake in water bath at 300F for 45 minutes. Chill. Torch sugar before serving.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Souffle
recipes.description: Light chocolate souffle
recipes.instructions: Make thick chocolate pastry cream base. Whip egg whites to stiff peaks. Fold whites into base gently. Pour into prepared ramekins. Bake at 375F for 12-14 minutes. Serve immediately.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Baba au Rhum
recipes.description: Yeast cake soaked in rum syrup
recipes.instructions: Make rich yeast dough with eggs and butter. Bake in ring molds. Soak warm cakes in rum syrup. Brush with apricot glaze. Fill center with whipped cream.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.description: Classic French beef stew braised in red wine
recipes.instructions: Brown beef cubes. Saute vegetables. Deglaze with wine. Combine all in Dutch oven with stock and herbs. Braise at 325F for 3 hours until tender.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Consomme
recipes.description: Crystal clear clarified beef broth
recipes.instructions: Combine ground meat, mirepoix, egg whites, and tomatoes. Add to cold stock. Heat slowly, stirring. Once raft forms, simmer 1.5 hours. Strain through cheesecloth.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Blanquette de Veau
recipes.description: Veal stew in white sauce
recipes.instructions: Poach veal in white stock with aromatics. Remove meat. Reduce stock, add roux to thicken. Finish with cream and egg yolk liaison. Return meat to sauce.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Roast Chicken
recipes.description: Perfect roast chicken with pan gravy
recipes.instructions: Truss chicken. Season inside and out. Roast at 425F for 20 minutes, reduce to 375F for 1 hour until juices run clear. Rest 15 minutes. Make gravy from pan drippings.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier

recipes.title: Sauce Bechamel
recipes.description: Classic white sauce base
recipes.instructions: Melt butter, add flour to make roux. Cook 2 minutes without browning. Gradually whisk in warm milk. Simmer until thickened. Season with nutmeg, salt, pepper.
recipes.author: Auguste Escoffier
